text: i am a year old student in korea and i am stressed overwhelmingly by academic and the sat

one of my friend lost his brother to suicide year ago and ha still not completely dealt withgotten over i hate using that term with reference to someonesomething that ha died it my depression ha become significantly increased in thei think my depression ha made me feel dependent on people and frankly im tired of it
i finally did it i just passed my graduation exam got my driver license and dad told me i can drive his car if i need to i am happy
i am depressed again but to depressed to do anything about it
finished my first paint by number love how it turned out
listening to my favorite music a i wait for darkness to see and photograph saturn a someone who struggled to make rent for year im so thankful and grateful for my life and this feeling of happiness
